items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Great quality with a perfect liner! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointed
items.body: There was more wrong with this dress than good. So let’s start with the good. It’s beautiful and fits perfect. I needed it for a funeral where the family wanted everyone to wear pink. Upon opening the used Amazon package there was a disgusting, very long piece of gray hair, which clearly meant that someone either tried it on or wore it. Then I noticed there were no tags on the dress…clearly a sign it was worn. Next, I believe the dress was worn because there were two holes, one on each side seam. And last but certainly not least, the back seam towards the butt area seemed to be splitting and about to come apart. So needless to say there was no way I could wear this dress. Very disappointed. For almost $50 I would expect a brand new dress in a sealed bag. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classy Dress for less
items.body: Great dress for a brunch! I got a ton of compliments! Does run a little big though Read more
items.author: Brian Collins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be ready for compliments
items.body: I received so many compliments on this dress when i wore it to work! It fit great and was very comfortable- the pockets a deep and help both work phones! The color was perfect- next to wear for fall photos!’ Read more
items.author: Ashley Desjardins

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very large
items.body: Runs very big. Fabric was nice, but sizing is a real problem with this dress. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Navy, Pink, Violet, White, Light Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
